title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.3 - Purchases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.3 - Purchases

State Regulations
(a) Such records
must show the daily amount of all purchases of alcoholic beverages made by such
licensee and shall include the dollar amounts and quantity of alcoholic
beverages purchased, the date of each purchase and the name, address and
license number of the person from whom such alcoholic beverages are
purchased. (b) Quantities of
alcoholic beverages purchased must be set forth in terms of the sizes of the
containers in which they are received such as half barrels, quarter barrels, cases, quarts, fifths, gallons and half gallons and shall be further identified
as to the brand name and type. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
69.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
